title: Enhancing Reflective Practice Competencies through Online Communication Tools in Higher Education

context.additional_context: Environment where professionals in medical/legal/technical fields experience collaboration and reflective practice using online tools to solve real workplace problems

Learners can reflectively analyze communication tool usage experiences from structural, human resource, political, and symbolic perspectives by applying Bolman and Dealâ€™s framework
Learners can evaluate constraints encountered during tool selection (e.g., security policies, organizational culture) and develop optimal communication strategies tailored to specific contexts
